content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Dear Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. To commence our negotiations, let me start with a proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month. Now, please share your suggested price so we can work towards an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing your proposed rental price. However, considering my financial situation and other options available, I believe 950 Euros would be a fair price for this apartment, given its location and size. I hope we can come to an agreement on this number.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I regretfully find your proposed price of 950 Euros insufficient for my needs, Maryam. My goal is to maximize the rental income from this property. Let us try to find a middle ground; I could consider 1150 Euros per month as a compromise. If this still does not meet your expectations, I don't want to continue the negotiation, due to my priority on securing a higher return on my investment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate your attempt to find a compromise at 1150 Euros per month, this price continues to be higher than what I can comfortably afford at present. Unfortunately, due to budget constraints, I don't want to continue the negotiation with this proposed amount, as it exceeds my financial capabilities. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
